verses.text: And in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w* shall take \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, We will \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* our own \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, and \w wear|strong="H3847"\w* our own \w apparel|strong="H8071"\w*: only let us be \w called|strong="H7121"\w* by thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, to take \w away|strong="H0622"\w* our \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w*.\f + \fr 4.1 \ft let…: Heb. let thy name be called upon us\f*\f + \fr 4.1 \ft to take…: or, take thou away\f*

In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall the \w branch|strong="H6780"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* be \w beautiful|strong="H6643"\w* and \w glorious|strong="H3519"\w*, and the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \add shall be\add* \w excellent|strong="H1347"\w* and comely \w for|strong="H8597"\w* them that are \w escaped|strong="H6413"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 4.2 \ft beautiful…: Heb. beauty and glory\f*\f + \fr 4.2 \ft them…: Heb. the escaping\f*

And it shall come to pass, \add that he that is\add* \w left|strong="H7604"\w* in \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, and \add he that\add* \w remaineth|strong="H3498"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, shall be \w called|strong="H0559"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*, \add even\add* every one that is \w written|strong="H3789"\w* among the \w living|strong="H2416"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*:\f + \fr 4.3 \ft among…: or, to life\f*

When the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* shall have washed \w away|strong="H7364"\w* the \w filth|strong="H6675"\w* of the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, and shall have \w purged|strong="H1740"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* from the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* thereof by the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, and by the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w burning|strong="H1197"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w create|strong="H1254"\w* upon every dwelling \w place|strong="H4349"\w* of \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, and upon her \w assemblies|strong="H4744"\w*, a \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* and \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w* by \w day|strong="H3119"\w*, and the \w shining|strong="H5051"\w* of a \w flaming|strong="H3852"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*: for upon all the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \add shall be\add* a \w defence|strong="H2646"\w*.\f + \fr 4.5 \ft upon all: or, above all\f*\f + \fr 4.5 \ft defence: Heb. covering\f*

And there shall be a \w tabernacle|strong="H5521"\w* for a \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* in the \w daytime|strong="H3119"\w* from the \w heat|strong="H2721"\w*, and for a place of \w refuge|strong="H4268"\w*, and for a \w covert|strong="H4563"\w* from \w storm|strong="H2230"\w* and from \w rain|strong="H4306"\w*.
